# Business Understanding

## Sub-Phases

### Determine Business Objectives
- Define the purpose of the macroeconomic forecasting app.
- Identify the key macroeconomic indicators to forecast.

### Assess the Situation
- Analyze the current forecasting methods and tools.
- Identify gaps and opportunities for improvement.

### Determine Data Mining Goals
- Specify the desired accuracy and usability of the forecasts.
- Define how the app will support decision-making.

### Produce Project Plan
- Outline the timeline, resources, and milestones for app development.
- Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies.

## Objectives
- Define the objectives of the macroeconomic forecasting app.
- Identify key stakeholders and their requirements.

## Deliverables
- Business success criteria for the app.
- Project plan outlining the development process.
